subject: @BeforeClass not being executed
msgSnippet: I have a static method with the @BeforeClass annotation, and it is not being run at all before my JUnit tests. My class extends TestCase and is a JUnit 4 test.
messageBody:
I have a static method with the @BeforeClass annotation, and it is not being run at all before my JUnit tests. My class extends TestCase and is a JUnit 4 test.

I simply have:

@BeforeClass
public static void Up() {
System.out.println("this should show up in the console");
}

Any ideas why this shouldn't be working?
